Preference

class Preference extends Model

This model handles the preferences of programs and applicants

Properties

$primaryKey

Methods

void
updateStatus(integer $prid, integer $status)

Update the status of a single preference

void
resetUncoordinated()

Reset (status = -1) all preferences created uncoordianted programs. This method is called during the findMatchings() process, to differ between successfull and denied offers

boolean
hasPreferencesByProgram(integer $pid)

Does the program has any active (status = 1) preferences?

hasPreferencesByApplicant($aid)

Does the applicant has any active (status = 1) preferences?

Collection
getAvailableApplicants(integer $pid)

Get all applicants that are available for a program (because the applicant has ranked this program)

Collection
orderByCriteria($applicants, $p_Id, $provider)

Takes an array of applicants and sorts them after the corresponding criteria catalogue of the provider or program.

integer
getLowestRankApplicant(integer $aid)

Get the lowest preference rank of an applicant.

at line 126
Collection orderByCriteria($applicants, $p_Id, $provider)

Takes an array of applicants and sorts them after the corresponding criteria catalogue of the provider or program.

Adds an additional order attribute to every entry containing the criteria score

Parameters

$applicants
$p_Id
$provider

Return Value

Collection applicants ordered, and with order-attribute (correspoonding criteria-points)

at line 189
integer getLowestRankApplicant(integer $aid)

Get the lowest preference rank of an applicant.

For example applicant 1 has ranked (1,2,3,4), the lowest rank would be 4.

Parameters

integer $aid Applicant-ID

Return Value

integer
